p: Among the 19 plants with pharmacological evidence, we emphasize Pterocarpus angolensis DC., Senna petersiana (Bolle) Lock, Pavetta sp. and Flacourtia indica (Burm.f.) Merr., that have a high antiplasmodial activitiy (half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC 50) < 5 Î¼g/ml as grouped by Laryea and Borquaye [ 50]).
